archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0720
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, when there are quicker ways of doing things, I want you to take the admin hassle out of running my account so that I can spend more time doing the things I enjoy, and have a better quality of life.

properties.value: Very generic, details to be discussed. Dedicated session Enterprise Portal

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
